Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 42 as enacted by s. 54 of An Act for the Substantive Equality of Canada’s Official Languages, in force on a day to be fixed by the Governor in Council see s. 71(4) — Not in Force

— ss. 58(2) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71 — Not in Force
— ss. 58(4) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 71 — Not in Force
